评论概述: Does not look like the picture. Fabric wise.
评论详情: I was definitely expecting better material. It’s very thin and shiny it definitely give cheap However the print/design looked like the photo not to bad. But the quality is definitely throwing me off. In the picture it looks very warm, comfortable and thick. I was expecting Nike quality esp for the price. But like I said the material is very shiny and thin. I picked size XL because I love a very lose jacket But however the size fit me just right so I would recommend going a size up.
